original_title: Walt Disney World Journey into Magic
overview: The spirit of Walt Disney World touches each of us in different ways, and for most children, it all starts with meeting Mickey Mouse.  Maybe you're looking to be a TV or Movie star, head over to Disney MGM Studios a place where movies, television, and theme park attractions all come to life.  Journey into Magic at Walt Disney world hosted by Tim Klein was produced in 1993.  The show features some well known Hollywood Celebrities including Scott Cassidy, Ed McMahon, Chris Hunt.
title: Walt Disney World Journey into Magic
